channel.title: Hey.. Easy problem

item.title: Hey.. Easy problem
item.dc:creator: @Ksu Ksu
item.description:
@Ksu wrote:

I fixed on my own, putting my fixed code for anyone with the same issue:

if (XinterfaceID == 13718){ if (EnteredAmount >= 29) { disconnected = true; return; } else cookItem(EnteredAmount); break; }

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Just wondering, whats the point of kicking them if they do over 28? i mean the max inventory space is 28, so being able to do 30 would not effect the game play at all.

item.title: Hey.. Easy problem
item.dc:creator: @Ksu4life Ksu4life
item.description:
@Ksu4life wrote:

Here’s the code:

if (XinterfaceID == 13718){ cookItem(EnteredAmount); }

Basically, it’s for cooking an “x” amount. I want to make it to where when they type more than 28 as the “Entered Amount” that it kicks them (disconnected = true;)

I can’t figure it out, please help.

Read full topic
